ingestDepost

public SWORDEntry ingestDepost(DepositCollection pDeposit,
                               ServiceDocument pServiceDocument)
                        throws SWORDException
To ensure the temp directories are deleted after ingest and the METS is proccessed first this method is overridden but it does call super.ingestDepost

Specified by:
ingestDepost in interface FileHandler
Overrides:
ingestDepost in class DefaultFileHandler
Parameters:
DepositCollection - the deposit and its associated collection
ServiceDocument - the service document which this request applies to
Throws:
SWORDException - if any problems occured during ingest
